short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add AI generated subtitles to any video or audio playing in your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This closed captioning extension lets you generate subtitles in real time, wherever you browse. Native language transcriptions and translations to English are supported, as well as some non-speech sounds.

Protect your ears with lower volumes, get the gist of that foreign language dialogue, improve your retention while studying, and follow the conversation!

Subtitle Anything is:

1. Free: No monthly payments or credits. If your device supports it, you can run it forever. Free.

2. Private: No data leaves your device. Subtitle Anything doesn't run translations using Google's (or any other) services.

3. Flexible: No site specific support. One extension. Any tab that plays audio. 99 languages plus autodetect.

This extension doesn't show ads and doesn't send your data anywhere.

Subtitles are generated by continually capturing a buffer of recent audio from any tab and passing it to a machine learning model. It needs a graphics card to do this quickly enough, and support on Linux is experimental.

See the official website for more documentation:
https://www.subtitle-anything.com/

Feel free to check out the GitHub releases and issues tracker here:
https://github.com/ae9is/subtitle-anything/
